note.p: English-born American farmer. Of Ridott, Stephenson County, Illinois. Formerly a baker in Nottingham. Emigrated to America, 1842.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO 107/870/8/10/12)
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestry.com, accessed 31 January 2017)
United States Federal Census 1860 (Ridott, Stephenson, Illinois [1]/10); 1900 (Ridott, Stephenson, Illinois [1]/18A) (Ancestry.com, accessed 31 January 2017)
U.S., Fnd a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 30 January 2017)
